title: Stuffed pork loin with chorizo, thyme and caramelised apple stuffing
description: The caramelised apple, thyme and crispy chorizo run through the middle of each slice of pork, with a drizzle of the dark balsamic sauce on top. It's absolutely delicious with greens such as curly kale and nutty brown basmati rice.
ingredients: 1 pork loin (about 2kg/4½lb), bone removed, skin scored
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 garlic cloves, minced into a paste with 1 tsp sea salt
½ tsp chipotle en adobo (from a jar, available in some supermarkets and speciality shops) or hot smoked paprika (pimentón picante)
